<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[School Spell Redirection](/Feats.aspx?ID=3027) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 241 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Runelord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=103)

**Prerequisites**
[Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=633); [Runelord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3020)

</column>

---

When you Counterspell a spell with a school matching your specialization, if you critically succeed at your [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check, or if you succeed while using a spell of a higher level than the spell you countered, you can redirect the spell you countered. You choose the target, area, and other aspects of the spell and use your own spell DC, spell attack roll, or other statistics as appropriate to determine the effects.
